metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2070 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The tcp_cwnd_reduction function in net/ipv4/tcp_input.c in the Linux kernel before 4.3.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (divide-by-zero error and system crash) via crafted TCP traffic.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2070` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-1002-aws - 4.4.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-13-generic - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
